text: Diego Pélicles da Silva (23 October 1982) is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Centro Esportivo Força e Luz as a forward. ==Career== Born in Natal, capital of Rio Grande do Norte state, Diego started his career at hometown club América (RN). He played twice in 2003 Copa do Brasil. He finished as the runner-up of 2005 Campeonato Brasileiro Série C and promoted to Série B. He was loaned to Baraúnas in the mid way of 2006 Campeonato Brasileiro Série B in July 2006. With Baraúnas, the team failed to qualify to the next round of 2006 Campeonato Brasileiro Série C and returned to América early, in August. Which América finished as the 4th and promoted again. In January 2007 he was loaned to Londrina for 2007 Campeonato Paranaense. In June, he was transferred to Aalesund. Diego Silva agreed to move to Bahraini club Al-Ahli on 10 September 2010 for $120,000 making him the biggest amount paid in the history of the club. On 31 August 2012, he signed for Swedish Allsvenskan club Åtvidabergs FF. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Diego Silva at ZeroZero Category:People from Natal, Rio Grande do Norte Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:América Futebol Clube (RN) players Category:Londrina Esporte Clube players Category:Aalesunds FK players Category:Åtvidabergs FF players Category:Al-Muharraq SC players Category:Botafogo Futebol Clube (PB) players Category:Gwangju FC players Category:Olympic Club de Safi players Category:Al-Ahli Club (Manama) players Category:Al Hala SC players Category:Eliteserien players Category:K League 2 players Category:Botola players Category:Bahraini Premier League players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Expatriate footballers in Bahrain Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden Category:Expatriate footballers in Morocco Category:Expatriate footballers in South Korea Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Bahrain Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Morocco Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in South Korea Category:Association football forwards
title: Diego Pelicles da Silva
